headline: Inflation Data, China Tariff Deadline, Cisco Earnings: What to Watch This Week
summary: This week brings another key tariff deadline: U.S. levies on China are set to climb on Tuesday if the trade truce isn't extended. Tomorrow will also bring consumer inflation data, which will be eyed with a view to when the Federal Reserve might start cutting interest rates.

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks to Target This Week
summary: Stocks that outperform the market usually share key traits such as rising sales, expanding margins, and increasing returns on capital. The select few that can do all three for many years are often the ones that make you life-changing money.
